page.title: 17CARS
page.content: My dad's car is called a Jeep it has four wheel drive and has got big wheels.You can take it over all terrain and you can take the roof off and it is red and black. It has got 4 gears and four wheel drive high and low. The engine has 6 cylinders and it can do 90 m.p.h. My mum's car is an Austin Maestro,it has 5 gears and 5 doors and 6 windows with speeds up to 130 M.P.H. The engine has four cylinders.The car is quite small compared to the Jeep although it will seat 5 people. The colour is red. I asked the children in our class about the cars they had.Between them they had 48 cars for 31 children.The most popular makes were Ford with 16 then Austin with 6.Other people had lots of different makes.
